1113233222.content:
Daenerys Stormborn of the House Targaryen, Queen of Meereen, Khaleesi of the Great Grass Sea, Mother of Dragons and Breaker of Chains. Daenerys also lays claim to the titles of Queen of the Andals and the First Men, Lady of the Seven Kingdoms and Protector of the Realm.

Dany (as called by some) is a beautiful young woman with silver hair and pale skin. She is one of the last (if not the last) surviving members of the Targaryen line. Born in Westeros but driven into exile when Robert Baratheon seized her father's throne, Dany has endured a life of many hardships. Forced to flee to Essos, she has had to elude Robert's cutthroats since her childhood as well as live under the oppression of her cruel, unbalanced brother, Viserys. It was Viserys who sold her to the Dothraki horselord Khal Drogo in the hopes of raising an army to win the Iron Throne. Despite the forced engagement, Daenerys grew to love her husband but over the course of their travels she lost not only him but also their unborn son.

However, Daenerys has shown exceptional resilience in overcoming every obstacle, as well as an iron will to attain every goal. Following the birth of her three dragons, she led the remains of her deceased husband's khalasar across the Red Waste to the city of Qarth, where she escaped the mysterious House of the Undying. From Qarth she travelled to Astapor, where she acquired an army of Unsullied and began her conquest of Slaver's Bay. While Dany is determined to reclaim her birth right, she is also familiar with the sufferings of her people and thus feels a responsibility to destroy the slave trade and bring happiness and freedom to the known world. These experiences have moulded her not only into a fierce and unrelenting leader but also into a kind and loving mother to her people, who would go to great lengths to ensure their prosperity.

With that in mind, will it be...
1113233222.title: Next

11132332221.content:
Now decide which location and what stage of Daenerys' story you'd like the following chapters to be set in. There are three possible options:

A. The Dothraki Sea
A great, grassy plain so vast it is called a sea. This region is sparsely populated as it is dominated by the many Dothraki hordes which roam the area, raiding and plundering the lands of other peoples and occasionally warring amongst one another. Dany could find herself in a great many ticklish situations in this setting, such as abduction by an enemy khalasar or at the hands of her brother, Viserys

B. Qarth
An isolated, fortified trading city greatly revered by its citizens. Its people are eccentric and flamboyant, adorning their walls with erotic imagery and sculptures. Perhaps one day Dany attends a public gathering which isn't quite what she expects or experiences an unforeseen event at the residence of her host, Xaro Xhoan Daxos

C. Slaver's Bay
Dany tours the slave cities assembling her army and negotiating surrenders. Could be that the Masters of Astapor demanded a very specific 'payment' for her army of Unsullied. Or maybe Yunkai sent their sellsword company, the Second Sons, to discover her weakness. Or again, she might have had an unlikely encounter with one of her servants or advisors in her chambers in Meereen

Which will it be?

111323322212.title: Qarth/Slaver's Bay

1113233222121.content:
The small but powerful khalazar of Daenerys Targaryen was worn down. Almost crazy from thirst and relentless heat they dragged their feet through the Red Waste towards a place they could not yet see but was promising everything one could imagine. For most of the men water, food and rest was what they were looking for. Daenerys was longing for much more, although she was also tired and thirsty. Her dragons were in better shape. More suited for hard hot conditions they were restless and looking for adventures.

Daenerys knew that she owed someone a lot.

Kovarro, one of her blood riders, had discovered Quarth on a desperate quest and was now guiding her towards the great walled city. How would they be received?

Jhogo, who had brought along three senior envoys from the City of Quarth. Now they were escorting her to the place they were looking for. Friends or a trap?
1113233222121.title: Qarth

11132332221212.content:
The khalazar was mainly on foot and slow from exhaustion. They arrived at the meeting point later than expected by the three senior members of Quarth's leading societies. Of course those had waited in the shadow with an ample supply of water and a light mounted guard. Above them were the steep walls of a big natural stone gate the gravel road was leading to.

Daaenerys immediately sensed the tension between the three, already struggling for superiority in their right to greet her and to indicate that she might be welcome in Quarth. For her taste the eyes of all three of them, although the one with the female voice was hidden by a fancy helmet and face mask, lingered too long on her.

When they made their way through the gate Daenerys and everyone in her khalazar slowed down an gazed with awe onto the vast city with mighty walls fortified against the surrounding desert. She felt relieved that she had senior envoys from the city walking next to her. But they had carefully circumvented any direct invitation into the city, she pondered. What would they want? Her three little dragons were carefully stowed away further to the back of the baggage train.

When they reached the vast city gate they halted. Daenerys cast a curious glance on the bald man with a very sharp facial expression who had introduced himself to her as Pyat Pree. He looked back and said:

1 - Now show us your dragons

2 - You have to enter alone first

3 - Something she did not understand at first

choices: Has to prove her strength. Tickling test

"You have to enter with us, but just on your own. Your people will wait until the council of The Thirteen has decided." Daenerys had sensed earlier that there was trouble ahead. The city gate had not been opened upon their arrival. She silently fumed at this unfriendly treatment of a guest.

"You do not have the level of authority to provide access for your guest, even if you escort him to your own doorstep?" Her response was calm but the insult could not be misunderstood. He managed to smile while gritting his teeth. "It takes more to pass through this gate than being one of many to claim the Throne", he paused, "even more if your power does not even stretch far enough to provide enough water for your entourage to survive in the Garden of Bones".

She managed to have Kovarro as her single guard. While her horse and wagon trail settled in front of the gate and water was provided under the careful watch of the city guard, the envoys, Daenerys and her single bloodrider passed through the massive gate and entered Quarth. The dragon queen was watched by bystanders. She was impressed by the lavish clothing of the citizens, while the women all seemed to wear a dress slung over one shoulder that left one breast free. Kids roamed the streets, not caring that they only wore paint on their bodies and leather footwork.

When they reached the impressive building where The Thirteen met for consultation she was asked to wait. Pyat Pree entered the door to the room where she and Kovarro were standing, with two young women following him carrying a dress. "You may enter the consultation with The Thirteen" he said, "but you have to match the clothing requirements for this meeting." Daenerys met his stare. While Kovarro made a quick step towards Pyat Pree, she held him back. "I will comply. For my people."

Shortly afterwards she enters the room, dressed in a beautiful samite quartheen gown. Her right breast was bare in the Quarth fashion. She immediately had the attention.

How did the meeting go?

11132332221222.content:
As you wake you struggle into a sitting position, swinging your legs off the stuffy goose-down mattress connected to the wall and rubbing the sleep from your eyes. You looked up and survey your small servant's cell momentarily. Everything is as it was when last you checked. Opposite the bed a small wardrobe contains what few clothes you possess. In the far corner, by the door, is a book shelf with a small number of old tomes and scrolls. A simply-carved table and chair are located in the middle of the cell and along the far wall is a modest fireplace to keep the chill from the room. At present there was no need, for sunlight was streaming through the cell's only window and you could already contemplate the heat baking the brick streets and plazas of Meereen.

Thankfully there would be no need to brave that heat today. You were a cupbearer in the service of Daenerys Targaryen, Queen of Meereen and Mother of Dragons (perhaps they were the reason for the extreme heat!) and today you had your duties to attend to. In truth you were a child of noble birth, raised part of an ancient ruling family for most of your life. Since the Dragon Queen had taken the city, she had decreed that all the great houses surrender their offspring as hostages in order to ensure their good behaviour. One of those hostages had been yourself and while you had first been terrified at what might happen, you had quickly warmed to your role of glorified servant. Your cell might be modest but it was certainly preferable to the jail cells in the lower levels or, worse yet, the inside of a dragon's stomach. Above all, your new queen was a just ruler, generous and kind to those who served her well. She refused to hold the hostages to account for their families' crimes and treated them as warmly and gracefully as if they were her own children. In addition she was stunningly beautiful, her long silver hair streaming past her shoulders, and one smile from her was enough to cause your insides to tie up in knots.

After you had donned your simple servant's garb (consisting of a tunic, breeches and boots) and returned from breaking your fast, you leave your chamber and quickly set about your duties...

11212221122.content:
You know that the beautiful young queen will not be pleased if you return with a toy not up to her standards of "exotic". As you relax in your new feather bed, you think on who you should go and capture. The queen has given you gold dragons to aid you in finding your prey, so money won't be a problem. The real challenge lies in paying the right people.

After a while you decide that the queen would be most pleased if you bring back a wildling spearwife, a fighting woman from Beyond the Wall. These women are considered as good of warriors as the men, and are fiery of temper. Someone as sadistic as Queen Margaery would love to tickle someone with a bit of fight in them. However, you're in the Red Keep, and the Wall is hundreds of miles away, let alone the vast wastelands behind it. Good thing you've got the gold for a ship.

A day or two later, after having your quest approved by the young queen, you hire a ship bound for cold Winterfell, the closest ships will take you to the wall. The first thing you notice when stepping on your ship is that it's exclusively manned by the dark-skinned Summer Islanders, renowned for their sailing skills. The second thing is that the crew is all-female, which is something almost unheard of in Westeros but apparently more common on the Summer Isles. The coal-skinned women amble about in their feathery but still practical clothes, scrubbing the deck with brushes or adjusting the rigging. It's quite the sight.

You board the ship and promise the captain, Xara, payment upon delivery. As you retire to the craft's modest accomodations, you can't help but notice how the crewmates are eyeing you interestedly. You begin the voyage to Winterfell later that day.

"Who is there?" you ask. Then the door opens and in walks Xara the Captain and two of the crewmembers. Xara wears tight leather trousers, and a brown leather vest, that crops at the bottom revealing her belly and navel, and also displays her cleavage. She also wears a crimson bandanna on her head. Her crewmembers however are wearing the same feathery yet practical apparel as the other she-sailors.

"We are here for some 'payment,'" says Xara, as her crewmembers approach you and grab your arms.

"Payment?! But I promised you payment upon delivery," you say.

"Oh, not that kind of payment, silly boy," she says with a grin. She then approaches you, reaches towards you, and begins undoing the cords that hold your tunic together. Then she opens your tunic revealing your toned torso to her.

"Hmm, such fine pale skin," she says as she places her hand on your chest, and lets it slide down onto your belly. "And such tender flesh. I will enjoy exploiting it."

"You see, little boy, I spoke to the young Tyrell queen before we left, and she informed me of your every little weakness," Xara said, in a rather calm fashion.

"What weaknesses?" you replied.

The sea and air was filled with a light mist, which would soon turn into fog, which was why the ship was only staying in the town for as short a time as it did. You breathed in, the cold, misty air filling your lungs, waking you up a little with its bite.

1121222112221.content:
The kraken confirmed that the Greyjoys were attacking the port town and all it's ships! You knew they had been more active during the war, but you had never expected them to attack this far to the south east! The Iron Islands were all the way on the other side of Westeros, and you had expected the Ironborn to remain occupied with keeping whatever strongholds left in the North.

The ship tried to cast off, but it was quickly rammed by a large warship. The sailors drew their weapons and you quickly picked up whatever you could find, but you all realised you were heavily outnumbered. You decided to surrender. Maybe they just want the cargo?

Through the smoke, you heard what you thought was a woman's voice. "Just as I said, men! Summer Islanders! A whole ship crewed by women. You will each get a salt wife!" It was a little deep, but you definitely placed it as being a woman's voice rather than a mans. The leader walked up the line of captives, surveying them. She got to you and stopped. You looked up and realised you were looking at the only daughter of the King of the Iron Islands, Yara Greyjoy.

She had short, mousey brown hair that was slipped back. She wore a dark tunic and armour with the kraken on its breast plate. She was very attractive for someone who lived on Pyke and fought in ship battles constantly. If perhaps not conventionally beautiful, then the power she wielded among men more than made up for it.

"Hmmm. I didn't expect to find a boy on this ship. And a handsome boy at that too," she said to you with a sly smirk.

You stood up in defiance. "I am a man, Greyjoy! Not a boy!" All the Ironborn around you drew their blades and made towards you, but Yara threw up a hand, ordering them to halt their advance.

"Such fire! I like a boy with that. And I haven't had a chance to have fun in so long." She eyed you up and down. "Put him down below. I'll decide when I want to play with him. For now, we sail for home"

You are quickly taken down below deck and put in an area with all the other prisoners. You settle down in the dark and wait, wondering what the future holds for you.

Unexpected though the response may be, a smile slowly dawns across the young Lady's face as she lowers herself down to her knees.

You couldn't have known it, but she loves it when her victims, of which you are just one of many, have sensitive toes. Not that she'd admit it, but it always brings her immense, sadistic joy to attack someone's soles in ticklish torment, all the way back to her youthful tickle fights with her brothers. Even now, as a grown woman immersed in courtly politics, she is always on the lookout for an excuse to run a nail down the bare foot of her cousin Elinor, sending her into a giggling spasm.

"I thought your feet looked sensitive when I was tying you up" she teases, her head at your groin level. After stopping briefly to admire her view at that level, she lowers her gaze you feet, one sole now resting on the other, with your toes curled defensively.

She reaches out, grabbing your left foot and raising it up so your foot is at right-angles to her face. Your soles are dirty from the shuffling of your feet on the dirty dungeon floor - dirt cakes your sole, your toes are muddy and wet from a puddle you are standing in, and some unknown fluff is caught between your toes. Noticing it, you try to dislodge it by wiggling your toes.

"Let me help you with that!" Margaery says, passing her fingers between your toes. Even this slight touch is enough to bring a snort of laughter. The noblewoman seems surprised at how sensitive you are - you're clearly going to be a lot of fun if you're this easy to set off!

She then proceeds to brush down your sole, once again testing the waters of your ticklish under the pretext of cleaning up.

"AHAHAHAH PLEASE AHAHAH STOP AHA" comes your response, jerking your body violently to try and escape. Margaery is a seasoned hand however, and her grip is strong enough to keep you under control. In fact, she manages to sneak in another couple of brushes while you squirm about - this only sets you off further.

Eventually you come to a stop, panting slightly as you catch your breath. When you refocus, you realise the cleaning is about to get a bit more intense. Margaery calls in a guard, who wheels in some heavy wooden stocks, with two holes for your feet. The more worrying development is the tool that Margaery seems intent on using for the next stage.

What is it?

112132.content:
The young Lady Tyrell was certainly caught off-guard by how eager your answer was, but somehow you detect a slight disappointment in her voice. And judging by the grimace marring Margaery's beautiful face which you catch while she thinks you aren't paying attention, you could not be more right.

Obviously, you are not the first young man she has captured to be tickled, but you did not know she had always been very reluctant to vellicate the feet of her victims. Just about every man she had captured, from their late teens to early thirties, always seemed to be lacking in proper foot care and aesthetics. Of course, the bulk of her victims were typically peasants or smallfolk in general (the ones that "would not be missed for a while") but that was beside the point. As soon as she took one look at a man's feet and their poor hygiene, she would either skip them or use something other than her hands to tickle them. However, she would only do this for a minute or two, even if the feet were the prisoner's absolute weakest spots. And as "boyish" as you appear to her, even you are being held to her low expectations in that regard. Nevertheless, the would-be queen had felt obligated, as it were, to test your most ticklish spot, even if she feels disgust on the inside.

Without a word, Margaery kneels down to your waist level and grips your right, trouser-clad ankle tightly. Naturally, you feel nervous as you know very well what is about to happen, even though you had revealed your ticklishness of your own free will almost immediately. She lifts your ankle off the dungeon floor with little resistance, and, as if on reflex, you immediately curl your toes as she positions your foot to her eye level.

But Margaery, as always, wants a genuine impression of what she is dealing with. Looking up at you, she says, "If you wish to stay on my good side, then I suggest you uncurl your toes at once."

Her words seem neither curt nor polite, but to you obeying this woman just seems like a natural response. As natural as the shivers crawling down your spine. Without further provocation, you uncurl them as she had 'requested'. At this point, you accept you are wet clay in this woman's hands, hers to shape to her will.

Without even a nod of approval, Margaery turns her gaze back to your bare foot. Dungeon floors were not exactly the cleanest spaces in the world, so she had expected to see a fair amount of dirt on your soles. But even with your sole browned by the dirty floor, she could see visible traces of skin both pinkish and pristine. This she was definitely not expecting.

The now extremely curious noblewoman begins to brush the dirt and mud off the bottom of your foot forcefully. You immediately burst into heavy giggles from the overwhelming sensation, even if the effect is unintentional. Though she does not cease in her task - it was apparent this woman was on a mission - she is understandably surprised by your reaction. Just the slightest touch is enough to send you into hysterics. It is very clear to her your feet are as ticklish as you had claimed, and honesty is a quality she admires in her prisoners.

Of course, you could not perceive any of this because Margaery's 'cleaning' of your foot has you bouncing up and down on your left foot, the tickling on your sole forcing you to shut your eyes and focus only on the maddening sensation running swiftly to your brain. The chains around your wrists provide you with little slack and yet they conversely keep you from falling on your rear. Either way, this lady has you bound in an uncompromising position. As it 'stands', you have no other option but to keep laughing while you attempt to keep your mind intact.

After a couple minutes - though this whole thing felt like an hour to you - Margaery removes the last patch of dirt from the rather large foot in front of her. This is probably the most and only form of 'work' she has ever done in her life, but the sight that greets her eyes made it worth her while. Even at a glance she could tell there was nothing wrong with your foot, but she draws her glance out into a stare as she scrutinizes your sole. No matter where she looks, she cannot find a single corn, callus, or even a bit of excess skin anywhere on it. All she could see is how soft and smooth your sole and toes are, even enticingly so. To her it was as if your feet have never touched anything harder than silk velvet before your meeting. And although she had noticed the tops of your feet from earlier, she had not noticed how short and evenly-trimmed your toenails were until now. Apart from whatever dirt got stuck under your toenails and what little smell remained from long periods spent in snug leather shoes and linen foot-wraps, there is nothing on either foot to suggest they are less than perfect. To top it off, their bigness only meant more room for her to tickle and appreciate. All of this, combined with your boyish good-looks and lithe form, would make your status as a keeper for your captor more than certain.

To say Margaery Tyrell is pleased she had finally nabbed a very cute young man who took great care of his feet would be the Understatement of the Decade.

The overall lack of activity and the knowledge this noblewoman is gazing intensely at your foot makes you quiver with anticipation. Hoping to break the ice, you attempt conversation with her, if only to relieve some of the apparent embarrassment on your face. "Um, milady? Are you feeling alright?" you ask nervously, wiggling your toes absentmindedly.

This simple action is enough to snap Margaery out of her reverie, her eyes are drawn to your adorable toes. She gives a light chuckle in response, almost girly. To this apparently happy young woman, you were a hand-wrapped gift from the gods themselves. Before you arrived at King's Landing, she had never been more eager to tickle a man's feet, much less focus wholesale on that part of the body.

At last she addresses you. "Goodness me, little boy. Such devotion to these feet have left them delightfully soft and perfect for tickling." As her large expressive eyes meet your now flushed face, her smile reveals her perfect teeth.

112233321.content:
Your tenure as a scribe in the castle of Dragonstone was a mixed blessing. You had long heard that Harrenhal was the most miserable keep in the in the Sven Kingdoms but for those first few weeks of your life on Dragonstone, you would have gladly traded your right arm to sweep the floors of Harrenhal if it meant getting away from this forsaken place. The storms and cold still keeps you awake at night, though they were forgiving and gentle compared the attitudes you faced. You fit in poorly at first. Dragonstone was a cold, hard place that bred cold, hard men. The sailors and soldiers that didn't ignore you held open contempt for you, prompting you to withdraw back into your studies. You had wished to be a Maester but your family, a minor noble one, thought that you might be forge connections with the man that would surely be King.

On the other hand, you loved the history of the place. It was full of fascinating relics. You often wondered who had walked the halls before you those many ages ago when ancient Valyria ruled the world. You also had the less academic benefits of being fairly popular among the women. Though still an attractive young man, you were more gentle and refined than the hedge knights and captains who usually sought the company of the many handmaidens about the castle. You had fallen into a routine of quiet paperwork, study the the occasional company of a maid. You wouldn't call it ideal, but when you weighed up everything, it wasn't a terrible life.

This routine was disrupted by the arrival of that cursed Red Woman and her attendants. Melisandre had supposedly come from the east, though you had once bitterly joked that she had been manifested by Dragonstone itself as a way to keep you perpetually unhappy. Whatever differences you had with many of the other men, you had a shared disgust when she burned effigies of the Gods that you had helped you through many a stormy night and given you solace as the war raged. You had tried to keep your head down as you often did, even as servants and nobles alike began to be purged. In your head, though, you remember the night that a serving girl stood by awkwardly as you went on a wine-soaked tirade about her heresy.

The night sticks so closely in your mind because that is the reason why, at least you think so, that you were dragged out of your chambers last night and down to the dungeons. You spend the last night going through various states of panic and terror, mind full of the rumors of her burning those who displeased her alive. You had little else to do, your wrists were chained tightly above your head. All you could do was kneel on the blankets that one of your friends had so kindly provided to you this morning after she allowed you to wash yourself. When you asked her why, she had only told you that the Red Woman had insisted you be bodily clean. The thought that you might be sacrificed to the demons she worshiped was forefront in your mind.

Before you can fall into another panic, however, the door to your cell swings open..

1122333211.content:
As much as you hate her, you cannot deny that Melisandre has an allure about her beyond any woman you've seen. You have seen beautiful, powerful women before but all the terrible insults and curses you always fantasized about flinging her way seem to vanish. You kneel there, transfixed as she closes the door behind her. She carries a bright torch, which further illuminates her flowing crimson gown . She walks across the room towards you, the gentle tap of her heels on the stone floor fills you with dread. You fear that she might set you alight here and now but instead, she sets the torch in a wall before looking down at you with a warm smile on her face.

The Red Woman stands over you for a few moments, before kneeling down in front of you. She fixes you with a deep, piercing stare. You can almost feel her looking into your very soul. You had always dismissed the rumours that she was a witch, you had always thought that the priesthood of the Red God were little more than charismatic swindlers who used flames to enrapture the dull-minded. However, as she raised her hand and gently touched your face, you felt something powerful you could not quite explain.

"You feel so cold." She almost sounds almost sorrowful as she speaks. You feel that this isn't the mocking, faux pity of somebody tormenting you, but as if she is full of genuine sadness for you. "I can see how cold you are. The cold within is so much greater than the cold without, though. You let doubt and fear dampen the fire in your spirit."

You have no idea how to respond, you open your mouth to speak but you can't manage any sound. The only thing that breaks your trance is the flash of steel as she draws an ornate dagger.

"Please.. I..I'm innocent! Don't kill me!" You plead as you try to recoil away, convinced that this is the moment she will slice your throat. She seems to sense your fear and gently traces her fingers down your neck, prompting you to twitch in response.

"Shh.. be calm. I have no intention to kill you. Why would I kill you when I want to save you?" As she speaks, she takes a hold of your nightshirt and slices a hole into it, careful not to catch your flesh. Once she is done, she tears open your shirt entirely, revealing your bare chest. Seemingly to reassure you, she places the dagger back in it's sheath and removes it from her belt entirely, placing the weapon out of reach. Once she had done this, she gently places her hand over your heart.

"I know you think that you hate me but I need you. The realm needs people like you, people bright and learned. I saw in the flames that there is a great future for you, if I can only restore the warmth to your heart. You must let me do that though and I intend to convince you to do that."

You have no idea what she means by this, but before you can inquire, she moves her hand off your heart and begins gently tracing her fingernails up and down your ribs. You can feel laughter pooling as the gentle tickling sensation runs through your body. You try to move your body away but she does not cease, steadily increasing the pace. Just when you feel you might break, she begins teasing the other side of your chest in the same way with her free hand. You twist in your bonds.

"Embrace the warmth and laugh for me." Melisandre whispers.

You try to hold out, but it becomes too much, the steady tickling causes you all the laughter you held back to burst out.

"P..phee..ha..ha! Ple..haha! Please..Hahah!.. stop!" You beg, through your enforced giggles.

Eventually, after a few minutes that felt like hours, she finally ceases. You slump in your bonds, panting and trying recover your breath after her methodical assault on your sides. You look up at her, and see that her smile had broadened. Her eyes have lit up as she surveys the broken captive before her. After a few moments, she traces one hand from your side back to your rapidly-beating heart, placing her palm against it.

"I can feel the warmth returning to you. Laughter is the joy and the warmth that you have tried so hard to seal cut out while you were alone with your books. I know of the hateful things you said but you only hate yourself. I came to bring light and truth to this cold place."

You have no idea what she is saying but there is something mesmeric and engaging about it. Still, you can't take another bout of torment, you want to throw yourself on her mercy. You'll say anything now, all you want is for her to stop.

"I'm..I'm sorry! I was drunk..I never planned any treason against you, milady... Please let me go.." "You seem not to have listened to me. I am not here to punish you for your remarks. I feel no anger for you, I feel pity that someone so bright has no joy or warmth. I can see now that I have a great deal more to do to help you understand, but fear not.."

You giggle lightly into your gag as she gently brushes the feather over your torso. She takes the feather and twirls it in the center of your left armpit. You tug your arm, trying to close it shut to block off access to your ticklish underarms. Melisandre then wiggles the feather over your neck, resulting in quieter chuckles from you. Disappointed, Melisandre moves back to your left underarm and spends the next couple of minutes focusing on it.

She then spends the next few minutes alternating between your left and right armpit. With your left underarm, she moves the feather around in a circular pattern, speeding up and slowing down at seemingly random intervals. With your right armpit, she wiggles the feather around furiously, occasionally slowing down or tickling less intensely. Either way, this is more than enough to keep your constantly laughing and pulling at your bonds. Melisandre then starts racing the feather up and down your side as you scream and beg mercy into your gag. She briefly returns to your neck before going back to brushing the feather up and down your sides.

She brushes the feather along your ribs, teasing your tender ticklish flesh. She starts using the feather to tickle between each and every individual rib, driving you nuts. After a few minutes tickling your ribs, she sticks it into your belly button and you nearly explode. At this point, you're almost crying from the sheer torture of the tickling. By the time she stops to give you a break, you're struggling to breathe. She laughs, satisfied with how she tickled you to near madness once again.

"Your laughter is truly infectious," she comments, taking off the blindfold for just a minute. You look around and see an array of tickling tools lying on a nearby table. Your eyes widen in horror as you see Melisandre reach for...

On the second day, Melisandre decides to try something new with you. You're not bound and shackled like you were the previous day and you were thankful for that. Melisandre tells you that today the two of you are going to play a little tickling game to test your endurance.

"What kind of game?" You ask inquisitively, not having a good feeling about where she was headed. Although, then again, anything beat being tied up and defenseless against her evil fingers and tools.

"A rather simple game," Melisandre says, before handing you a tray. "You have to hold that tray over your head while I tickle you for a certain amount of time. If you drop the tray, then I win and you get tied up and tickled again without mercy. If you can hold onto the tray the entire time I tickle you there you win. However, there are three rounds to this game with each round lasting longer than the last. If you survive all three rounds, then you are free to go without getting tickled at all."

You liked the sound of that, but you doubted that you could survive three rounds of her agonizing tickling. You cast your doubt aside however as a lack of confidence definitely won't help your chances. Accepting her challenge, you grab the tray from her hands and hold it over your head. You close your eyes and wait for the tickling to begin and soon enough, it does. At first, she doesn't flat out tickle you, instead only massaging your sensitive skin with her hands and watching as you struggle not to squirm. This is going to be hell.

You giggle as her hands gently caress your flesh, occasionally scratching it with those long fingers. Finally, she settles on her first target: your exposed underarms. This was bad as you could pull down your arms at all. You started giggling and fought against the instinctive response to bring your arms down to protect your armpits. She wiggled her fingers in your armpits only a little bit and it was still almost too much. Your body began twisting from side to side in an attempt to get away from her for just a few seconds. This ploy works, but only for 2 or 3 seconds at most. After that, her fingers are once again burrowing into your hollows.

"Are you already considering giving up?" Melisandre asks. "Such a shame, I thought even you could last at least one round,"

"Hehehehehehehehehehahahahahahahahehehehehahaha I'm not giving hahahahaha up hehehahahehehahahehehahahehehaha," You say, determined to prove that you can last long enough to win her twisted little game.

"That's good, because I'm having a blast," she says as she starts tickling a little bit harder. You squeal just a bit as you're caught off guard by the sudden change of pace, but maintain your grip on the tray.

Melisandre scrapes her fingers up and down your armpits, occasionally venturing down to tickle your ribs for a moment. While her tactics do catch you by surprise, it's not enough to get you to drop the tray. She tickles you more and more, becoming more aggressive in her attacks as she tries to get you to drop the tray, but you hold out. She moves her hands down and tickles in between your ribs but even this fails to disrupt your concentration. After 5 minutes…

After five minutes have passed, she stops tickling you. You sigh a breath of relief as the tickling ends for now. She has a smile on her face, almost as if she's impressed. You continue standing with the tray held over your head, preparing for her next tickle attack.

"Very good, you survived the first round," she says. "Although that is to be expected. As sensitive as you may be, I didn't think that even you could fail to make it past the first round. Prepare yourself however, as the second round is about to begin and I promise you that this time I won't be as merciful"

You gulp and return your focus to the item in your hands. You tried to brace yourself so that you'd be ready when the tickling resumed, but you knew that there was no way to prepare for her tickling. Yesterday was bad enough being tied down and tickled, but to have to endure that a second day would surely eat away at whatever little sanity you had left.

As you went about your daily chores, you think to yourself about the advantages of being a servant to House Martell as well as the disadvantages. One being the very task you've been set with, changing each bedroom's linen. Although the disadvantages out weighed the advantages considerably, there was one reason for you to stay and you was walking past that very reason. "Arianne" you groan as you pass her room not concentrating that you've gotten your foot caught on some of the bed linen you're holding. Losing your balance and footing, you fall to the floor with a thud and you immediately clutch at your ankle feeling a shooting pain. "OW CRAP" holding it tightly, you wasn't sure if you had broken it of not and you really didn't want to move your hands to check.

You was in too much pain to realize that there was a figure standing over you and it wasn't until you see their shadow, you realize you're not alone. Your eyes travel up slowly, taking in the fine silks that wrap and cover this figure's curvaceous body . Reaching the chest area, your eyes bug out and you now realize who this person is. Gulping, your eyes meet her large brown eyes that seem to pierce your very soul "uhhhhhh" your mind drawing a blank as to what to say, you settle with ogling her body some more. This long stare and silence seemed to aggravate her and as you finish gazing at her long black hair, her deathly stare averts your gaze. "What are you doing on the floor?........get up" hands on hips, she waits for you to get your feet "I-I can't......my ankle......its hurts".

Glancing up at her for second, you could see her deathly stare had disappeared "is it broken?" she asks as she kneels down beside you. "I-I.....don't think you should be kneeling on such fine silk Princess Arianne". She rolls her eyes "its fine servant, now let me see you ankle" reluctantly moving your hands, you jump when she grabs your leg and removes your shoe "OW" you shout making her sigh "stop being a baby, its not even broken". As she inspects your ankle, you couldn't keep your eyes off the bountiful cleavage she was inadvertently showing off for you. "Nothing serious, just a sprain" looking back at you, she catches your staring at her chest. "Are you listening to me servant?" you quickly nod "oh really....so what did I say?".

Thinking for a second, you say the first thing that comes to mind "its not broken?" narrowing her eyes, she didn't look pleased with you. "I already told you that" she scratches your foot to give you some pain but instead you surprise her with a laugh. "You laughed......why?" "I'm sorry Princess, its just.......I'm kind of ticklish". Her eyes look at the sole of your foot and a small smile forms on her lips "is that so" you nod slightly, not liking the tone of her voice. "So if I was to....." she gives your foot a quick tickle making you laugh out loud and grab her wrist "please Princess don't do that". An awkward silence fills the hallway before she speaks "if you know what's good for you servant, you'll release me" quickly taking your hand away like you've been burned, she lets go of your foot.

Standing up, she looks at the bed linen strewn across the floor "you'll do my room next servant after you dispose of those". She turns and walks toward her room "but I'm not aloud into your room" she stops and looks back at you "I'm not asking you, I'm telling you. Now get to it" with a bad ankle, you manage to stand and walk off with the dirty bed linen before returning to Arianne's bedroom where you find her sitting on a chair opposite her bed. "I usually change the linen alone" "well this time I'll be present.......to keep watch so to speak, now get to work". Nodding, you set about changing her bed's linen all the while having her intently watching you. There was a thought in the back of your mind that this could be some sort of trick to get you into trouble but you could never know what she was thinking.......until it was too late.
11223332221.title: Beauty can be dangerous

112233322211.content: Would you like to continue with the current story with Arianne or try a different story with her?
112233322211.title: Something different?

1122333222112.content:
What kind of story would you like to read or participate in

Arianne's Slave

Simple. You're her slave and she can do anything she wants with you.


Her reward for you

You're a brave warrior who risks you're life to fight for the Martell House. Your reward for your service is Arianne. She is willing to give herself to you as your reward........until she tricks you and tickles your ruthlessly.


The Spy

You're a spy within the Martell House, your mission is to retrieve plans and send them back to your King. Easy right? you thought so too until Arianne catches you in the act.

Which one will you choose?
1122333222112.title: What kind of story with Arianne?

11223332221123.content:
It had been 3 months since you successfully infiltrated the Martell House. Using the story that you had been banished from the land you grew up on, you had found your way to the Martells where you was welcomed in. Agreeing that you would help with chores and other tasks, you settled in quickly and began your mission. Any plans that the Martells had, you would message back to your King in secret.

Time and time again, they would form new plans which you'd send back. Each time foiling the Martell House. In the present day, you was being careful and quiet. Making sure not to draw attention to yourself seeing as everyone was suspecting a traitor among the house. Staying in the background, no one would suspect that it was you of all people that would be the traitor they all hate. They had already accused and slain 3, all of which were servants to the house.

With so much at stake, you thought it would be best to hold off on your mission. But that thought was pushed out of your mind when you over heard someone talking to themselves. Stopping by the slightly opened door, you listen quietly "with these plans, the Martell House will rule all of the land". You look around to see if anyone is in sight of you "I'll keep these safe in here until I'll show them to the others".

Peeking through the gap in the door, you see her place some rolled up scrolls beneath her bed. A smile forming on your face, you quickly walk off before you could be seen. "Plans to rule the land.......my King will reward me greatly for those". In order for you to retrieve those plans, you'd have to sneak in her room just before sunset seeing as the Martell family settle down for tea around that time.

It was approaching sunset and you was stalking your way toward Arianne's bedroom. Your mind filled with possible rewards that your King would prize you with. Slipping into her bedroom, you waste little time in walking to her bed and looking under it to find the scrolls "excellent". Grabbing them, you stand up to find........
11223332221123.title: A Spy Within

choices: The Master of the Martell House wakes you
112233322211232.content:
Frozen to the spot while clutching the scrolls, your eyes met Arianne's as she stood with hands on her hips and a deathly glare on her face. "So we finally meet......spy" trying to form a sentence or even a word was proving difficult. "The banished traveler.......HA, lets see how welcoming they are when they find out you're the one". You couldn't figure this out, how did this happen. It was so easy, everything was now crashing around you.

"GUARDS!!" her shouting brought you back to reality then as 2 over-sized guards walk in, you gulp and drop the scrolls. "Seize him" as they head toward you, you could only think of one thing "oh crap". Grabbing you, they turn you toward Arianne "I'm sure you're wondering how you've been caught......well its easy". Reaching down, she picks up one of the scrolls and opens it "its blank you idiot........there was no plan for ruling the land, that was just bait to lure you in".

A blank scroll before your eyes made your heart drop and body weak "I've been watching you so called banished traveler, I knew from day 1 that something wasn't right with you". With a smirk on her face, she steps toward before giving you a stinging slap to the cheek "take him to the cells.....I'll inform everyone that we've caught the traitor". As they drag you away, the sound of Arianne laughing filled your ears "I was tricked". You soon found yourself in the cells where you only get dirty bed a small window to look out of.

Seeing as it was getting to night time, you figured no one would come to the cells until the morning so until then, you made yourself as comfortable as you could and got some sleep. Tomorrow was the start of your new life.
112233322211232.title: To the cells

1122333222112321.content:
You was hoping it was a nightmare and you'd wake up in your normal bed but the rattling of your cell door squashed those hopes. Blinking your eyes open, you lay your eyes on one of the guards "get up scum" sitting up on the bed, you yawn and stretch. Seeing as you'd be spending what would probably be the rest of your life confined in the cell, you observe your surroundings. A large stoned walled room consisting of 10 cells all of which were empty apart from yours.

Walls and doors of the cells were thick metals bars that were too narrow for you to slip your hand through. The only light that filled the room was from the small windows but the most surprising thing was the bed you had slept on was rather comfortable. Considering there far less padding to lay on, you still got a decent night sleep. Standing up, you walk to the cell door and try to peer toward the main door of the room.

Seeing no one in sight, you turn and climb onto your bed and look out of the window "freedom would be real nice right now". "In your dreams spy" looking behind you, you see Arianne staring at you "I guess you've come to gloat at capturing me" stepping off the bed, you sit down. "I feel no need for that, I'm not that type of person. I am hear to tell you what will happen to you" a smile forms on her face "every morning you'll be woken by one of the guards then you will eat. After that, you'll be brought to a room for interrogation for the whole day. When it comes to sunset, you'll be taken back here and the process repeats itself until you confess and gives us the information we need".

Nodding, you sigh "great.......something to look forward to" she smirks "of course if you're willing to tell us everything now, we'll let you go". Staring at her for a second, you lay down "so what's for breakfast?" a sigh of frustration from her before she turns and leaves. Not long after she leaves, a guard enters your cell and hands you a bowl "eat" he grunts before walking out and locking the cell door. Looking at the contents of your bowl, it didn't look very appetizing. A pale yellow liquid with lumps that they expected you to eat "jeez, it looks like someone's vomit".

In any other case, you'd happily discard the bowl of disgusting slop but with your stomach growling for food, you had no choice. "I'm going to die in here".
1122333222112321.title: Life as a prisoner

11223332221123211.content:
Having just the finished cold, yellow, lump bowl of disgusting slop, 2 guards open your cell door "its time traitor". With an unpleasant after taste in your mouth, you're lead down a series of hallways until you reach a large wooden door. With guard opening the door and the other behind you, you figured trying to escape would be useless. Stepping into the room, you didn't really get a good look since the guards grabbed you and chained you up to the stone wall.

They soon left you alone which gave you time to look at the room you'd be spending most of your days in. Thick steel chains with shackles held your arms above your head and your legs against the wall. No windows but 2 torches on the walls to your left and right. Directly opposite you was a array of objects or in your case, tools hanging from the wall which would be used during your interrogation. Another chain, 3 different sized blades, a whip of some kind and a spear.

In the far corner to your left was a large chest which most likely had more objects of torture inside. You wasn't exactly keen to know what was in there but you was sure you'd find out whether you wanted to or not. Knowing that all those objects of torture would be used on you made you rethink you're last comment "screw the cell, I'm going to die in here". With that said, the door opens to reveal your interrogator.

(The tickling will come soon, just want to build it up)
11223332221123211.title: To the dungeon

112233322211232111.content:
A cloaked figure filled the doorway and as they stepped into the room, they almost had to duck under the doorway to enter. A dark brown robe with a hood that was large enough to partially cover the person's face. You also notice that the figure's feet was covered by the robe that made it seem they were gliding across the floor. The room felt a lot smaller with robed figure now inside "the spy I presume" with the door being slowly closed, you try to remain calm "its pointless making a dramatic entrance so lets just get this over with".

The robed figure turns toward the wall of hanging tools "hmmm what to choose.......what would get you talking?". Reaching out and taking the chain, the figure turns back toward you "I wonder how it would feel having this swung at your knees repeatedly". Whoever this person was, they was going to get some sick pleasure from your pain. "Lets begin" as they step toward you, the door swings open and Arianne steps in "there's been a change of plan, I have made it my responsibility in making this spy talk".

The robed figure simply nods before handing the chain to her and leaving "only I will get to hear to you beg for mercy". As she inspects the chain with a smile, you figured this was as good as any time to tell her. "I must warn you that I have been trained to withstand any sort of pain no matter how intense". She steps toward you "is that so?.......does that include me cutting your balls off?". "Even you wouldn't do that" she nods "perhaps".

Dropping the chain to the floor, she folds her arms "so......you can tolerate pain" she looks at you up and down. "I guess I'll have to change tactic then". Stepping up to you, you wasn't sure what she had planned "instead of screams of pain, how about we have a good laugh". Confused as to what she was talking about, you remain quiet "not knowing about this training of yours but I think its safe to assume that you wasn't trained to tolerate tickling".

Your eyes widen "tickling?" she grins "I prefer screams of laughter to screams of pain especially when it comes from a sneaky spy like yourself". Pulling at your shackles, you sigh "lets say you do tickle me, what makes you think I'm ticklish?". "Everyone is ticklish......well everyone I've met so what makes you different. When was you last tickled?" you shrug your shoulders "I don't know, probably when I was a kid".

"And you haven't been tickled since?" "not that I can recall.......why?" biting her lip, she reaches out and drags a single fingernail down your arm. "Not being tickled for such a long time must have made your body so sensitive" you flinch at the sensation of her nail on your arm. It was only one nail and you was already becoming slightly frustrated "tickling is childish and there's no point to it". Her nail glides down your arm toward your underarm "awwww don't be like that" wiggling her finger in your underarms makes your squirm and squeal a little.

"Just one finger makes your squeak like a girl" you feel your face become hot "I would continue to tease you but I have some preparations to make". She heads toward the door "GUARDS" calling out for the guards, you was very confused. "Take him back to his cell and leave him there until I say" having been released from your chains, you was soon back inside your cell where thoughts were running through your mind as to what Arianne was planning.

All you could do wait and find out.
112233322211232111.title: The change over

choices: Maybe it won't be that bad
1122333222112321111.content:
You had spent most of the day in your cell pondering as to what Arianne had planned for you. The only clue you got was she was going to tickle you for information but why didn't she do it earlier. What are the preparations she was referring to?. These questions swirled in your mind until your thought pattern was interrupted by Arianne herself. "Enjoying yourself in there little spy?" you stand up and step toward her "what exactly do you have planned for me?".

She smiles "you'll have to wait and see but what I will say is at this very moment, I have a group of craftsman constructing various.......objects that will aid me during my interrogation of you". That didn't exactly answer any questions you had in your mind "oh I also have a friend of mine brewing up a special something that I'm sure we'll both enjoy". You was becoming more confused by the second but there was also the feeling of being a little freaked out especially by her tone of voice.

"Now enjoy this moment of peace because tomorrow is when the fun begins and I promise you that by the end of the interrogation, you'd have wished that you told me everything". A sadistic grin forms as she leans toward the cell bars "sleep well" she turns and walks away leaving you nervous and now very freaked out "crazy bitch". Sitting back down on the bed, you sigh as your thoughts now rest on what happens tomorrow.

"Tickling........why me?" you groan as you fall back on the bed while kind of wishing for pain instead.
1122333222112321111.title: Hints of her plan

11223332221123211111.content:
With the morning upon you and another bowl of disgusting goo in your stomach, you was taken to the interrogation room where you find Arianne waiting for you by the door. "I hope you had a good sleep spy" she smirks at you before opening the door "when I'm done with you, sleep is all you'll want". You stare at her feeling confused by her statement seeing as you'd be sleeping later tonight anyway "what an odd thing to say" she rolls her eyes "just get in there".

Shoved by one of the guards, you step inside the room and your attention is instantly drawn to the large metal frame in the middle of the room. Thick steel girders fixed together in a X shape with shackles connected. 2 shackles for each arm as well as your legs. "As you can see spy, my team of craftsman have been busy" she walks past you and inspects the frame. "I'm sure you already know what this will be for" gulping at the sight of this frame, you look over your shoulder at the guards before back at Arianne. "Don't worry, they won't intrude on our.......fun" your calm demeanor was all but gone.

"Now be a good boy and stand against it" giving her a glare, you step toward the frame. With a smile on her face, she proceeds to shackle you to the frame "I have lots of plans for you spy". Once you're restrained to the frame, she steps and admires her handy work "goody, now I can explain to you what's to come......but first". She moves toward the door "guards, you can leave" once its just the 2 of you, she closes and locks the door. "Perfect, just the 2 of us.......as it should be" circling your helpless immobile body, she bites her lip "I can't wait to start".

Your arms fixed above your head and your legs unable to move, you stay silent as Arianne tells you what she plans to do with you.
11223332221123211111.title: Day 1

112233322211232111111.content:
"Now before we get started, let me give you a little show and tell" she steps beside you "as you probably already know, this frame will keep you in place thanks to its large steel girders and the shackles of course". You try to pull your arms down but there was no resistance from shackles "you will be able to move your hips but you won't get away". If you wasn't restrained, things would be very different for example it would be Arianne in your place but that was a far away dream.

"There also a specially made rack and stocks but we'll get to those when we need them" she walks over to that same chest you saw before. "In here is a number of tools" opening the chest, she takes out the standard items "different feathers, a few hairbrushes". What she takes out next is a small velvet bag "now what we have in here is something I can't wait to try on you". Opening the bag, she puts her hand in and after a few seconds you can see that her fingers now have what look like claws.

"These beauties are metal claws which aren't sharp enough to cut you but still sharp enough to give you a good scratch". She wiggles her fingers at you "imagine these on your underarms" you shudder at the thought". Putting the menacing claws back in the chest, she takes out some gloves but the palms and fingers are encased in feathers. "These I won't be using often seeing as there for one specific part of your body" she gives you a sly smile "I'll let you figure which part".

Judging by her expression, you wondered if she was referring to......your intimate place. From the feather gloves to a bottle of oil "this will make you extra slippery.......this is really for my benefit". Placing the bottle back in the chest, she then takes out a small glass vial that contains a bright purple liquid. "This stuff is strong, one drop of this on your skin will make you hyper sensitive" your eyes bug out "are you insane?......crazy bitch". She laughs "I maybe being crazy but you deserve this, I'm going to enjoy breaking you down bit by bit. Each day I'll focus on one part of your body, tickling you beyond your limits until you talk or you pass out".

Gulping, she leans toward you "I'll let you in on a little secret spy, I don't care if you reveal everything to me or not. I'm going to tickle you until you become my submissive pet". She gives you a sadistic grin before disappearing behind you "today we'll start with your underarms".
112233322211232111111.title: Plan A (Full on Tickle Torture)

1122333222112321111111.content:
As she stepped behind you, you pull hard at the shackles but all that results are some sore wrists. "I wish I could jump out of my skin" you think to yourself as she slowly wiggles her fingers down your arms. The painfully slow decent toward your underarms wasn't helped by her taunting you "kitchie coo spy". When she did eventually get to your underarms, she used a single nail to graze against your skin which felt like an electric shock through your body. Jolting then pulling at your shackles with frustration was very amusing for Arianne. "Oh my......sensitive underarms" grunting at her, you clench your teeth as she starts lightly scratching and poking your vulnerable pits.

Twitching at every touch, you was losing your stern expression and was being replaced by a small smile. "Holding out on me spy.......don't want laugh huh?" she steps around so she's facing you "have it your way spy but don't I'll tire of this". She immediately goes on full attack scratching away at your underarms "I will not stop, I will not quit until I have made you my pet". Her relentless attack on your underarms soon got what she wanted as you began laughing. She was ruthless toward you as she dug her nails into your hallow pits bringing out tortured laughter.

It seemed the more you laughed, the more she tickled you to the point that your underarms were becoming red and raw with scratches. The redness she caused made her stop and let you take a breather "you're far from broken spy, those few minutes were nothing". You uselessly pull at your shackles again "you won't and you never will break me" your defiance toward her made her smile. "We'll see" she moves over to the chest and opens it up "now lets see......what should I use".
1122333222112321111111.title: Nothing but fingernails

11223332221123211111112.content:
You couldn't see what she was doing seeing as she has her back to you "lets see how ticklish you are when all slippery". Turning toward you, you could see she was rubbing her hands together as some oil dripped onto the floor. Rubbing her oily hands all over your underarms, she smiles as you twitch "oh yes, wet and slippery underarms to give a good tickling". With your underarms more slick, Arianne restarts her focus on your vulnerable underarms. It may have only been a few minutes since she started but you could already tell there was great difference between the use of oil and just bare skin.

Her nails scribbling all over your underarms was pure hell "this is just day 1 spy, we've still got so many more days of fun". She works away at your underarms for 15 minutes of non stop tickling. Your skin had absorbed the oil in about 5 so the last 10 minutes had let your underarms sensitive and raw with large scratches. When she eventually stopped, you was a sweaty mess and your throat sore form all the forced laughter you had endured. Trying to regain your breath, you hadn't noticed Arianne carrying a jug up to you "thirsty?" nodding, she lifts the jug up "open your mouth then".

Pouring the water into your mouth, you greedily take as much as you can "better?". The water soothes your throat "yes......thank you" she smiles "no problem". She then upends the jug over your head causing you to gasp "oh crap that's cold" putting the jug down, she walks toward the door "you're starting to smell, you need a wash" she opens the door "GUARDS". A few seconds after, 2 guards arrive "take the prisoner to the bathing area and make sure he scrubs up good. I don't want a stinking prisoner" the 2 guards release you from the x-frame and take you to the bathing area.
11223332221123211111112.title: Oil and fingernails don't mix

112233322211232111111122.content:
How it happened you wasn't sure but the tickling seemed to have taken its toll on your energy level. The guards pretty much had to drag toward the bathing area "its not possible" you thought to yourself as you enter the area. "Time to clean up" the guards throw you into the water with your clothes still on. Surfacing the water, you cough and splutter up the water "now get cleaning" the guards stand by the entrance leaving you to clean yourself. "Am I supposed to clean myself with my clothes on and with no soap?" "stupid question to ask".

You look up to see Arianne walking in looking far from impressed "take off your clothes and get scrubbing". She throws a cloth at you followed by some soap. Holding them, you look at Arianne "aren't you going to leave?" she smirks "are you shy?" you look down at your soaking clothes before peeling off your top. "You're not that tough for a spy are you?.....can't even handle someone tickling you" submerging yourself, you remove your clothes beneath the water "I haven't talked yet".

"Yeah and like I said earlier that I'm not interested in what you have to tell me anyway now hurry up, we've still got a lot more tickling of those underarms of yours". Your underarms were still sore from her constant scratching with her nails "can't you move somewhere else, I'm still raw". She rolls her eyes before turning away from you "tomorrow........be ready" she looks over her shoulder at you "its only going to get worse for you".

Once she leaves, you stay submerged in the water before you start to clean yourself "how can it get worse?".
112233322211232111111122.title: Nothing like a clean spy

1122333222112321111111221.content:
The next morning you awoke with your mind filled with yesterday's events. From the torture you received at the hands of Arianne to the embarrassing walk back to your cell while being completely nude. It was definitely one of the worst days of your life and yet there was more to come. "Good you're awake" seeing your tormentor with a smile on her face, you roll away from her to face the wall "leave me alone". She giggles "awwww don't be like that, now come on get up or I'll get the guards" groaning, you get up from the bed making sure to cover yourself.

"Now since you no longer have any clothes to wear, I figured I'd get you something to wear so no one can see your nakedness". Opening the cell door, she throws the garment onto your lap "go on, try it" the light colored robe looked to be sleeveless "I doubt I'll be wearing this during" she smiles "of course, I want unrestricted access to you". Reluctantly standing up, you slide the garment over your head "should be soft" she wasn't wrong, it was possibly the softest thing you had ever felt "I like the back of it the most". Looking at her for a second, you take the robe off to see why she favors the back.

Etched in gold thread was the words 'Arianne's Slave' "a perfect description of you...... now put it back on". Putting the robe on again, you was given your breakfast before taken to the room. "Today will be interesting" she tells you "I'm still not pleased with how yesterday went when you couldn't manage a mornings worth of tickling". Entering the room, you find some stocks instead of the large x-frame. She pats the seat "you won't need to take off your robe today, I'm sure you've already realized that your feet will be getting the attention".

Gulping, you sit down and your feet are locked into the stocks "and just to make sure you don't try anything" she then restrains your arms above your head. "There, perfect" the stocks were rock solid, there was no movement from them so freeing yourself would take some sort of miracle. "Today I've something special" that smirk of hers that you despise so much made your skin crawl as she heads toward the chest.
1122333222112321111111221.title: Day 2

11223332221123211111112212.content:
Out of sight, Arianne picked up a hidden bucket that was beside the chest so as she turned toward you, you tensed up awaiting for the contents of the bucket to be thrown on you. Arianne simply smiled before placing the bucket down next to the stocks "don't worry, I down intend to waste this water by throwing it on you". A brush suddenly appears in her hand and starts dipping the brush into the water. "This water has had lots of salt added to it" she starts brushing your feet with the salty water making you jump at the sensation. "Confused aren't you?" you continue to watch her soak your feet with the salted water.

She would allow your feet to dry before wetting your feet again. This process seemed to last for hours until your feet were encrusted in salt. "Perfect" Arianne leaves the room while you're left to wait for her "how exactly is this going to tickle me?". She returned a minute later but she wasn't alone, Arianne lead in 2 goats "I'm back and I brought some friends with me". Staring at the 2 goats, you wasn't sure why she had them "I'm sure you have them for a reason but I don't really know why". Arianne smiles "well I figured you and them would have fun together".

"What do you mean, do you want me to pet them?" she giggles "no but after today I'm sure you'll become best friends with them". You nod while thinking that Arianne had gone crazy "yeah sure". She brings the goats toward you "goats love salt" seeing the goats sniffing your feet, you try to pull your feet away. "Whoa, hold on a second" an evil grin forms on Arianne's face "I think they'll give you a good licking". Your eyes widen as she lets them go and they immediately go to your feet "I hope you'll enjoy yourself".
11223332221123211111112212.title: Your new friends?

112233322211232111112.content:
Arianne immediately takes notice of how tense you are and licks her lips. She circles around your vulnerable body like a vulture, teasing you about your current helplessness. She gently pokes and prods at your torso and smiles as you squeal and jump from her mere touch. You know you're about to be tortured and the anticipation as well as Arianne's teasing just serves to make you all the more jumpy.

"Don't be so tense, spy," She advises you as she stops poking you. "Don't worry, I'm not going to torture you…yet; rather, I'll give you a chance to cooperate. Tell us who sent you and I'll show mercy,"

You ponder for a while, contemplating your choices. Should you reveal the identity of your King and risk being branded a traitor should you ever be freed? Should you play along and give Arianne false information and hope that she believes your lies? Or perhaps you should remain silent and hope that you can withstand Arianne's torture? You doubted you'd ever escape the Martell House with your life, let alone be freed so the chance of being branded a traitor by your King was slim. If you lied to Arianne, there would be serious consequences if she discovered the truth and you definitely didn't want to dig yourself any deeper.
