1122333222112321111121211112211.content:
"While I did enjoy the way you giggled and wriggled under the brush, I'm curious as to how you'll react to my fingernails in your underarms" Arianne says, dispatching the hairbrush and moving north. Continuing her teasing ways, she places her nails just below your wrists before slowly and methodically dragging them down your arms until she reaches your pits. Thinking she's going to get started right away, you close your eyes and prepare for the tickling, only for her to suddenly move her hands down to just below your pits and dig her nails into your sides.

"Eep" You squeak, taken off guard by the sudden change in course. In retrospect, with how much she's been teasing you with her tickling, you shouldn't have been surprised in the slightest. You let out more high pitched squeals as you feel Arianne slowly walk her fingers upwards and towards your underarms. "Eek! Ahh! Ooh! Gah! Eeheeheehee" You giggle as each attempt to hold in your laughter fails.

"I'm liking the reaction so far, I haven't even touched your pits yet and you're already losing your mind" Arianne says as her fingers crawl and inch their way closer to your pits little by little. "It's amazing how you men are. You're capable of taking a sword to the stomach and getting up to continue fighting, but few finger strokes make you giggle and squeal like little girls"

After what seems like hours, Arianne's teasing fingers finally make their way into your pits, but she doesn't commence with the vicious tickling right away. Instead, she uses one nail to trace a circular pattern in your pits, starting in the center, but gradually expanding until she is tracing her nail in the center and around the outside of both of your pits simultaneously.

"Urrrrgggh nohohoho pleahehehese don't dohoho that hahahahaha" You say as her finger alternates between a quick pace and slower pace

"If this is too much for you to bear, then I fear you might pass out when I get serious," Arianne scoffs at your plea, sadistically tracing around the edge of your underarms before suddenly diverting and diving into your hollows and rapidly twisting her finger in it.

"No no pleahehehehehehese ehehehehehehehehehehe" You giggle in agony.

Arianne changes her tactic, but continues with the teasing by using one index finger to scratch up and down the hollow of your pits. You can't tell which method was worse when it came to tickling.

"Hehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehe stahahahahahap" You plead as you helplessly try to pull your arms down to protect your underarms, only for your restraints to stop that from happening.

"This is certainly a better reaction than I expected" Arianne said as she continued scratching those two index fingers up and down your hollows. Up and down repetitively; sometimes quickly and other times at that slow, methodical pace she loved to employ. Whatever she did, it drove you crazy and you knew this wasn't the worst to come.

"Stahahahahahap ihihihit pleahehehehese hehehehehehehehehehe" You continue to implore, hoping that maybe she'll decide you've had enough and that this tickles the most.

"Begging certainly won't help your case" Arianne says, going out of her way to make the experience as torturous as possible. One by one, Arianne introduces more fingers into the fray until eventually all five of her fingers are wiggling in both pits, causing you to almost go mental.

"Hahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahaha nohohoho more hahahahahahaha" You beg as Arianne scratches her nails in your pits, leaving no area untouched.

"Is it too much to handle?" Arianne asks, never letting up.

"Hahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahaha Yeeeeeeesssss hahahahahahahahahahahahahahahaha" You answer.

"Good" Arianne replies, furiously tickling.

"Ahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahaha hahahahahahahaha" You laugh hysterically.

When Arianne finally feels like she's tickled you enough, she asks you "So tickle toy, which tickled more?" and adding "Now answer truthfully as I'll know if you're lying"

Which tickled more?
1122333222112321111121211112211.title: To move onto the final round

11223332221123211111212111122111.content:
After a few moments of deliberation and breathing heavily, you answer "The rib tickling with that hairbrush was just unbearable. The feather foot tickling hardly an issue and the underarm tickling still had some level of tolerability, but that dastardly hairbrush to my ribcage nearly drove me insane."

"Nearly drove you insane?" Arianne chuckles before joking "I clearly must be losing my touch if I only managed to almost drive you insane." There are a few seconds of awkward silence as you wonder if she believes you. You weren't lying in the slightest when you said the rib tickling drove you nuts, but if she didn't believe your answer you knew that there would be hell to pay in the form of undoubtedly more tickling punishment. Although to be fair, you'd probably still be tickled even if she did believe you. Finally, Arianne breaks the silence and says "I don't find that answer to be hard to believe given the way you were squealing and squirming"

"Whew!" You think to yourself, silently breathing a sigh of relief. Of course, wouldn't you know, that wasn't the end of things."

"But..." Arianne says causing you to tense up and wheeze in fear of the whatever sick form of tickling she's planning. "Your torment is far from over." She walks around your prone, helpless, naked body like a scavenger eying its next meals. "I'm now left to wonder if the rib tickling tickled you more because of the instruments used or because they're the most ticklish area of the three I tickled. I already know just how awfully ticklish your stomach is, but I want to know your other most ticklish spots for future tickling. There's only one way to find which area is truly more ticklish-"

"Oh no," You say, having a good idea of where this was headed. "You don't mean-"

"That's right, we get to play another round of 'Which Tickles More'" Arianne confirms with that sadistic smirk spread across her face.

"No, please no more of that" You groan, also sounding like you're about to cry from the news.

"Oh, don't worry. This time there'll only be two rounds of this game" Arianne reveals. You don't know whether you should feel relieved by that news or not, but the revelation is strangely comforting. "This time, only your feet and your underarms will be tickled. Your feet with my fingers and your armpits with the feather. The only thing you have to worry about is which area I decide to tickle first."

She decides
11223332221123211111212111122111.title: Rib tickling with hairbrush

112233322211232111112121111221111.content:
Arianne walks down to your helpless bare feet and you close your eyes in anticipation of what's seemingly coming soon. You'd come to learn that with Arianne, you'd never know what to expect. She could easily be walking towards your feet only to surprise you by turning back around and plunging the feather into your underarms. You try to convince yourself that you're prepared for either scenario to play out, but deep down you know that's a lie. Arianne was a master of playing mind games and using them to build your fear and anticipation, which would make any situation much much worse. Even if she wasn't setting up to swerve you by approaching your feet, the very thoughts in your head kept you on edge.

You heard her footsteps stop at the end of the table where your feet lied before there was a long pause. What was happening? Why had she stopped all of a sudden? Was she still trying to make a decision or had she changed her mind? Your heart was almost pounding out of your chest with sweat dripping down your forehead as these questions raced through your mind. You dared not to open your eyes, keeping them clenched shut for fear of whatever sight should await you should you open them.

Finally after a few more seconds that feel like hours, you feel something. A single, long fingernail tracing down over your left sole. You clamp your mouth shut, barely able to keep a snort and a snicker from escaping your lips. Then you feel another one of her nails tracing up and down your right sole. You bite down on your tongue and fight to keep the giggles in. You start losing the battle when another nail joins in on your left foot, followed by another on your right. Two long fingernails moving repetitively up and down your soles, slowly and methodically.

"Hehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehe noooohohoho stahahahahahap ihihihihit" You say, the dam finally breaking.

"I've told you before, there's no point in trying to hold it in," Arianne says, as a third nail joins in on each foot. "Let it out"

"Hahahahahahahahahahahahaha ohohohoho gohohohod hahahehehehehehehehe" You say as the fourth and fifth finger gradually join the fray. Soon all ten of Arianne's fingernails are flickering over your soles while your feet can only helplessly twitch in an attempt to avoid Arianne's fingers.

"This is already much better than my previous effort at tickling your feet" Arianne says. "Perhaps the feather is simply obsolete"

You're inclined to agree as Arianne's doing a much better job at getting you to laugh from foot tickling than earlier. She rakes her nails up and down your soles rapidly to see if she can get an even better response from you. Needless to say, the trick works like a charm.

"Ahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahaha nohohohoho pleahehehehehehese nohohot thehehehehe nails hahahahahahahahaha" You implore, straining in an attempt to break free of the restraints.

"And I've already gotten you to start begging" Arianne notes with a smile. "Yes, this is much better."

She continues on your soles, scratching and tracing patterns on your soles with her nails. You can only hope that the torment ends soon, thinking that the feather tickling to your underarms will be much more tolerable.

"Ehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehe nohohoho mohohohore hehehehehehehe" You plead, face red from laughing so hard.

When Arianne finally does finish, you're more than relieved. She seems pleased with the results, but at the same time reluctant to move on to tickle your armpits. What does she do?
112233322211232111112121111221111.title: Fingernail Foot Tickling

1122333222112321111121211112211112.content:
When Arianne seemigly does finish up tickling your feet, you're tempted to breathe a sigh of relief, but refrain from doing so, knowing that no matter where Arianne tickles you next, your situation still hasn't really improved. The best you can hope for is a somewhat more tolerable tickle session. You think you might be getting just that when you see Arianne reach for two long stiff feathers.

"As tempted as I am to stay with those sensitive soles of yours, I feel that it would be better both for you and myself if I moved on to using these feathers to guage either how ticklish your underarms are... or how effective said feathers are" Arianne tells you, giving you time to prepare for what's coming next.

You take deep steady breaths and focus on easing your mind in order to calm down. You already know the tickling is inevitable and that it even at its most tolerable, it'll still be tormentous. Panicking or getting overly stressed and anxious will only serve to make your body even more sensitive and susceptible to the tickling.

"Can we please just get this over with?" You sigh, sounding like you've given up all hope and that Arianne has managed to actually break your spirit with her torture. You expect Arianne to punish you for your attitude/ mouthing off by perhaps unleashing a quick feather flury in your armpits that only lasts a few seconds before she stops while you're laughing madly, gives you a 3 second reprieve and starts back up again, this time at a slower more teasing pace. In yet another show of just how unpredictable she can be, Arianne instead chuckles at your remark.

"Well I certainly expected to break you, but I didn't think you'd become such a defeated downer" She says smiling, sighing semi-seriously and adding "That takes so much of the fun out of our game and actually ruins it a little"

You flash a quick, cheeky little smirk, making absolutely sure that she doesn't see it. You might've finally found a small way to get under Arianne's skin without ticking her off. If you could manage to beg and plead a little less when she tickled you; if you could manage to control your body and squirm a little as possible you might be able to get somewhat of a victory over her by essentially refusing to play along with her game. It was only a small act of defiance, but it was enough for you. You'd soon have your chance to defy Arianne as she began slowly stroking the feather up and down your armpits.

"Hehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehe" You cackled, using all your self control to avoid pleading or say anything. This was the easy part as Arianne gradually sped up the feather strokes.

"Hmm, maybe this feather really is a problem" Arianne thought to yourself. "Or maybe I'm simply not trying hard enough"

"Ahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahaha hahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahaha" You laugh as the plumes move at maddening speeds over your underarms. "So far, so good" You think to yourself.

"This calls for a little bit of creativity" Arianne says before pulling another trick from her sleeve and using the quills of the feather to stratch your armpits. This almost gets your to break your concentration.

"Ohohohohohohohohohohohohohohoho wahahahahahahahahahait ahahahahahahaha- hahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahaha" You explode into new levels of laughter thanks to being unprepared for Arianne's new technique.

Arianne switches tactics throughout the armpit tickling session, taking you by surprise every time you think you've gotten used to whatever tactic she was using before. Even though you manage to keep yourself from pleading with her, you struggle just as much as earlier, trying with all your might to pull your arms down to protect your pits. At the end of the session, Arianne asks you "Now tell me, which one tickled more?"
1122333222112321111121211112211112.title: Move on to the armpits

11223332221123211111212111122111122.content:
What you initially expected to end up being a relatively easy decision to make, wound up actually becoming a very hard choice. In all honesty, it was a close call between both the feather and her long savagely sharp fingernails as to which tickled more. Afterall, both had more or less reduced you to almost equally loud levels of hysteria. Was it because the feather was used more effectively this time that it became a factor, or were your underarms so ticklish that you'd end up going crazy no matter what was used to tickle them? Further complicating the choice was that if you could come to a unanimous decision as to which was worse, how should you answer her question. If the fingernails were what tickled you more, would it be better for you to answer truthfully, which would likely lead to the removal of the feather from the equation altogether; or should you lie and say that the feather tickled more in hopes that she'd stop using her fingernails to tickle you?

While that was a possibility, the chances were equally likely that it'd lead to a third round of torture to act as a type of tiebreaker. Likewise, would she believe you or call your bluff? No matter what decision you were going to make/ answer you were going to give, you had to do it fast as Arianne was clearly starting to grow impatient, tapping her foot in irritation.

"Well, which was it?" She asked, stepping towards your feet and wriggling her nails menacingly to encourage you to make your decision.

It worked flawlessly as not even a split second later, you said the first choice that came to mind, blurting out "Your nails! Your nails!"

Shrugging, Arianne walked over to where the feathers and brush resided and tossed them aside like discarded trash. "It seems that these feathers aren't as effective with you as they are with most of my other prisoners. Regardless, you have made your decision and thus there is only one more round left for you to endure."

You knew this was coming and were ready to just get the final round over with and be through with this game.

"The final round will have you determine which tickles more, my hairbrush... or my nails" She explains to you, grabbing the hairbrush. "Once again, I'll give you the option of deciding what I start off with..."
11223332221123211111212111122111122.title: Fingerail Tickling

choices: It's just to give you a break
112233322211232111112121111221111221.content:
"I'd like for you to start with the hairbrush" You inform her, hesitating as little as possible, knwoing that she'd make the choice for you if you took too long deciding.

"Very well," She says, smiling from ear to ear with delight as she picked up the hairbrush once again. "I appreciate you for not wasting too much of my time. Perhaps you finally understand just who's in control here"

There is method to your madness as she only has one hairbrush and she's already attacked both your feet and ribs with it, leaving your underarms and meaning she can only attack one armpit at a time. This wasn't much relief as the hairbrush still tickled like crazy, but it was certainly better than if she had two hairbrushes to tickle you with. She approaches your underarms, brandishing the brush as if it were some type of mighty sword or other form of weaponry and slowly lowers it towards your pits. Instinctively, you close your eyes and flinch before the item even makes contact, making Arianne giggle at your plight.

"I still can't believe after all the tickling I've inflicted upon you, you still jump and quiver before I even touch you" She says smugly. "I've already told you before that if you just relax and accept the tickling, it won't seem nearly as torturous."

Of course, you can't just lay back and accept the tickling, no matter how hard you try. It's impossible like decapitating an enemy without killing them. Your body is already sensitive enough and has been subjected to oils and tools to exploit that fact as much as possible. Your muscles tense as the hairbrush gradually lowers closer and closer to your left armpit. As soon as the bristles touch down, you lose it once more.

"Ohohohoho nohohohoho stahahahahahahap eheheheheheheheheheheheh hahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahaha" You plead despite knowing that it'll do you no good whatsoever as the bristles rhythmically travel up and down your armpit.

"You should know by now that there's no chance of me stopping right now when things are getting good" Arianne replies, gingerly brushing up and down your armpit.

"Rrrrrrrrrgh heheh mmmhmhmhmhmhmhm Ahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahaha" You try fighting it, only to give in about four seconds later.

"Just stop trying to fight the tickling and you might come to enjoy it" Arianne advises. "Although, we can't have that happening, now can we?" She speeds up the tickling in your left armpit and just so your right doesn't feel neglected, she flickers her fingers in its hollow as well.

"HeheheHey heheheheheheheheheheheheh eehehehehehehehehehehe you dihihihidn't hahahahahaha" You protest, unprepared for the sudden change.

"You didn't truly think that I'd let you get off even a little bit easy, did you?" She says in response, driving you crazy as the bristles brush around in your left armpit while he fingers twirl around in your right.

"Stahahahahahahap it stahahahahahahap ihihihihihit" You plead again.

"Never" She says, now scratching all five fingers in your right underarm.

When she finally decides to stop...
112233322211232111112121111221111221.title: Hairbrush

1122333222112321111121211112211112211.content:
There was only one more area left on your body that hadn't been explored by Arianne's wicked fingernails and that was your ribs. You knew it was only a matter of time before it came down to this and now, like a man who had been sentenced to be executed, who could only wait with dreaded anticipation. Hell, at this point you wondered if being executed like the other maids and servants you had framed would've been the better fate. If there was one bright side to all of this, it was that at least she was leaving your super sensitive stomach alone... for now. You hadn't been Arianne's prisoner for very long, but you already knew what a woman as sadistic as her was capable of and would do to truly torment their prey. The tummy tickle torture too, was only a matter of time, but thinking about that now would only serve to make you dread what was coming even more.

Arianne once again, didn't pass up the opportunity to taunt and tease you before getting down to the actual torture. This time, you tried to just ignore and block out her comments. You had become all too familiar with her mind games at this point and knew that it was psychological torture to torment you just as much as the tickling. That, and the fact that she became an aggressive and less focused tickler who kinda lost her touch when she was ignored. Again, it was a fifty fifty gambit as it could make her either more careless or more relentless and determined to break you. When she said she intended to tickle you into insanity, she clearly wasn't exaggerating and at this rate, she'd likely succeed.

"So my pretty pet, it's come down to the final round of our little game. Consider yourself fortunate that I decided to grant you mercy and move on rather than prolong your suffering even more." Arianne announced as you tried to think of anything other than the "game", having a distracted far away look in your eyes. Arianne didn't let that phase her and you wondered if maybe she had figured out your trick and overcome her previous weakness. "No words? Trying to distract yourself from the realization of having to endure at least five minutes of my long fingers and nails digging into your ribcage? Five minutes of my fingers poking in between each and every individual groove as well as pinching and squeezing all of the twelve tiny rib on both sides of your ribcage? Is the thought of my long nails gliding swiftly along your ribcage, occassionally stopping to scratch over them too much to bear? Or what about the idea of me haphazardly scribbling my nails over your ribs, hmm?"

As Arianne said all of this, she teasingly wiggled her fingers in your face while you lied helpless. Despite your best attempts to remain silent and ignore her, you couldn't block out her taunts, which were proving to be more effective than before as you were already giggling and squirming even though her hands weren't even close to your body. Perhaps by ignoring her, you had made her more vicious and by effect, made your tickling even more unbearable.

"Heheheheheheheheheh no no pleahehehehehehese stahahahahahap hahaha dohohon't do thihihihihis hahahahah" You were already imploring as you tried to stop giggling to no avail.

"Don't do what?" She feigned innocence, flashing you that sadistic smirk that let you know how much you were about to suffer. "My hands are nowhere near you, yet you contain your childlike giggling? I wonder how you'll react when I do THIS!"

Before you could even reply, she suddenly started scribbling her nails into the sides of your ribcage, resulting in an immediate and loud reaction.

"AHAHA NOOOHOHOHOHOHO STAHAHAHAHAHAP IHIHIHIHIT STAHAHAHAP IHIHIHIHIT HEHEHEHEHEHEHEHE" You protested before just like that her hands withdrew and your laughter returned to a more subdued level. The tickling only lasted 2-3 seconds but it felt like an 2-3 minutes.

"Interesting response, I certainly didn't expect you to get that loud" Arianne said before she once again unleashed quick and unexpected tickle attack, this time to your upper ribcage, digging one finger deep in between the top four ribs on each side and wiggling them as if she were giving you a massage.

"WAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA WAAAAIT WAAAAAAIIIIIT HAHAHAHA IHIHIHIHIHI EEP CAHAHAHAHAN- OOH HOO OHOHOHO" You try to say, trying to get her to slow down her tickling for just one second, only for your mad laughter to get in your way.

"What's that? I can't hear you" She says, letting out a quick almost silent smug snicker while you squirm around helplessly. She continues digging into your ribs, occassionally pausing for a few seconds and then picking up where she left off.

"OHOHOHOHOHOHOHO GAHAHAHAHAHAHAWD HEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHE GAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAWD" You scream, the tickling yet again being more torturous than last time.

"Don't bother calling on some god to save you, they won't be listening" Arianne arrogantly proclaims. "Even God knows better than to incur my wrath!" She moves down to your lower ribcage, just above your stomach to continue your torment.

"EHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEH PLEAHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHESE STAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAP" You beg. By now, there are tears streaming down your face and your almost out of breath, panting for air.

"Hmm, I don't know, I think you can handle some more" She says, scraping her nails up and down your ribcage.

"AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA" You laugh hysterically, running out of breath your stomach aching from how hard and how much you're laughing.

Then, the tickling stops...
1122333222112321111121211112211112211.title: Only one more left

choices: No Need for Chains and Rope
11223332221123211111212111122111122111.content:
The tickling comes to a stop and you're hesitant to open your eyes, expecting the stop to just be a sudden and quick reprieve before she dives right back in to torturing you senseless. After approximately 15-20 seconds of no tickling, you hear chains rattling and shackles being unlocked. You slowly open your eyes, one at a time and see Arianne standing at the foot of the rack, unlocking the shackles around your ankles. There is a noticeable expressoion of her face that looks like a combination of disappointment and dare you say, sadness. She looked like a child who had just been told that play time was over and it was time to put away their toys. You wear a puzzled expression on your own face that Arianne is quick to recognize.

"Surprised?" She asks you, a hint of boredom in her boice. "As much as I would love to continue tickling you into insanity, I have important business to attend to." As she says this, she finishes removing the ankle restraints and moves up to unchain your wrists. "And besides, you managed to survive all three rounds without passing out so I'll give you the rest of the day as a reprieve before we start again tomorrow"

"Great" You silently mutter to yourself, considering yourself fortunate that she didn't hear you. As soon as the cuffs are removed, you sit up and begin rubbing your raw, red and aching wrists. Your back isn't in much better condition owing to lying on solid wood as well as bouncing up and down on the rack repeatedly.

Arianne calls in her guards to escort you back to your cell. "Get plenty of sleep" She advises you. "Because tomorrow, I won't be nearly as merciful" To make her point, she reaches down and playfully runs her fingers over your belly, delighting in the high pitched squeal you let out as a result.

"EEEEEEEEEEEEEEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHE" You squeal, unable to even plead for her to stop as two of the guards hold you in place. The tummy tickling only lasted a few seconds, but the message was received loud and clear: Tomorrow would be when the torture truly began.

The Very Next Day...
11223332221123211111212111122111122111.title: You survived

choices: Put up a decent fight, but are defeated in the end
112233322211232111112121111221111221112.content:
For the first night in quite some time, that night you enjoyed a relatively peaceful slumber. It wasn't the most ideal night of sleep, in part thanks to the bed in your cell being rather hard and stiff, but you managed to get a quality sleep regardless. You knew that sleeping would provide you with a temporary reprieve from Arianne's torturous tickling and you took full advantage of that. You were awoken from your slumber the next morning when Arianne entered your cell, slamming the door behind her.

"On your feet!" She instructed as you groggily shook your head, trying to get a hold of yourself.

It took you a few seconds for you to get your composure and your movements were naturally rather sluggish. Your body and limbs felt incredibly stiff and a little sore but nonetheless, you slowly sat up and tried to get up before Arianne lost her temper. Still, you were a bit too slow for her likings.

"I said on your feet!" Arianne repeated herself, reaching down and running all five fingers of her left hand up and down the sole of one of your feet.

"Hehehehehehehehe I'm uhuhup! IhihihihI'm on my feeheheheheheet!" You insisted, almost literally jumping off of your bed and standing to your feet; that tickling being all the motivation you needed to pick up your pace.

"Are you getting an attitude with me?" Arianne asked, evidently not liking your tone. "Did I just hear you raise your voice at me?!"

"N-No ma'am, I'm sorry your highness" You stammered, quickly apologizing for your loudness. "I just got a little jumpy, it won't happen again"

"It better not" She said before revealing the reason she was in your cell, apparently all alone. "Today, tickle pet, I'm going to be taking a different approach with how I tickle you. Rather than have you squirming around in chains and bondage today while I expertly tickle you, I decided that I'd much more enjoy making you squirm around in my tight grasp while I personally hold you down. Understand me so far?"

You nodded and answered "Yes ma'am"

"Good," She replied. "So right now, I am the only thing standing between you and the door. If you can tickle me into submission than I would be more than willing to allow you to just leave. But if I tickle you into submission... well, you're well aware of what'll happen then. So, do you accept my challenge?"

The thought of getting payback is just too appealing for you to turn down and without much hesitation, you reply "Yes ma'am."

"Good, then we can begin" Arianne said.

The challenge begins and you...
112233322211232111112121111221111221112.title: No Need for Chains and Rope

1122333222112321111121211112211112211123.content:
The challenge begins and right out the gate, Arianne lashes out at you with a surprise attack on your sides. You don't have nearly enough time to react and quickly bring your arms down to your sides to shield them from the princess' probing fingers. 1122333222112321111121211112211112211131.title: They Start Blowing Raspberries

1122333222112321111121211112211112211131.content:
You are beside yourself with laughter, going absolutely apeshit as the three ticklers torment you mercilessly. Your face is redder than a tomato, your cheeks are wet from tears that rolled down your face and your laughter was growing more and more hoarse by the second.
Your entire body is drenched in sweat from a combination of crazed & uncontrolled cries of laughter that were more akin to the screeching of a wild animal than laughter and strenuous struggling against your bonds. Your stomach, wet from the raspberries, is aching from laughing so hard for such a long time and your lungs are yearning for oxygen, desperately trying to suck in air between your wild screams and begging for mercy.

"OHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHO PLEAHEHEHESE NOHOHOHOHO MOHOHOHOHORE HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA STAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAP HEHEHEHEHEHEHEHUHUHUHUHUHUHUHUH PLEASE HAHAHA HAVE MEHEHEHEHERCYYYYY HAHAHAHAHA" You beg, thrashing around trying to get out of the girls' reach.

It is only when you lapse into silent laughter that your pleas are acknowledged and the tickling stops. Not that one would know because it takes up to a full minute for the tickling sensations to start subsiding, during which you are still silently laughing your head off.

"Heheheheheheheheheehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehe hehehe" You giggle quietly to yourself as finally the tickly feeling fades and you settle down.

"I don't know about you girls, but I certainly didn't expect his belly to be that ticklish" The Redhead comments.

"Neither did I," says The Blonde. "It's a good thing we decided to give him a break."

"Indeed it is" Arianne chimes in. "Had you not stopped to give him a reprieve, I fear you would've possibly tickled him to death."

"Can't say I blame you for that" The Brunette says, pointing down at you and saying "I mean look at him right now."

You were not in the best shape right now as you are soaking in sweat. Your hair, wet, tangled and matted, clings to your forehead. Your face is an even deeper shade of red than before and several tear streaks going down the side of your face are visible. Your attempts to catch your breath and bring much need air into your lungs were less so panting and more so full on, almost animalistic gasping and wheezing, sounding like you were hyperventilating.

"I actually almost feel sorry for him," Arianne says, actually taking a moment to brush your hair aside from our of your eyes and wipe some sweat off your forehead. She even pets the top of your head as if you were a literal pet.

"So what do you want us to do, your highness?" Asks The Blonde.

"Give him a ten minute break" Arianne instructs them. "When you start tickling him again, I forbid your from blowing raspberries on his stomach and recommend you use tools to tickle him instead as he is much less responsive to feathers and brushes than fingers and nails."

"Yes, your highness" All three girls say, bowing respectfully.

"In the meantime, let's leave him alone to enjoy his break" Arianne tells them, leading the three out of the dungeon and closing the door behind her.

Ten minutes might not be much for others, but after the tickling you endured, ten minutes would feel like ten hours and you were going to enjoy all ten of those minutes.

Eventually your ten minutes ran out and the three girls, minus Arianne, returned and were wielding...
1122333222112321111121211112211112211131.title: To Give You A Break

1122333222112321111121211112211112211131.content:
You are laughing so loud and hysterically that you fail to hear Arianne announce to the three ticklers "Alright girls! That's enough!"

Thus, you are stunned when the tummy tickling and raspberries come to a sudden stop and you're allowed to breathe in again as the girls stop tickling you. You are drenched in cold sweat, your face is as red as a tomato and your chest heaves up and down as you try to take in some air. There are still a few tear streaks on your face from when your were laughing so hard you cried and your belly was wet and moist from the sloppy raspberries that had been blown over every inch of your stomach. Even after the tickling stopped, it still took you a couple of minutes to stop laughing as the four women stared at you. The Blonde snickered seeing just how terribly ticklish you were as they waited for your laughter to stop.

It was only after you had managed to compose yourself and you were simply gasping on the rack while weakly pulling at the chains that Arianne said something. "That was a very good job girls" She said, smiling proudly at her maids. "You certainly had what it took to make the tickle toy scream and beg for mercy"

She stopped, gave the Blonde an approving smile and said "And I certainly enjoy your sadistic desire to make him cry, another task at which you succeeded."

The Blonde cheekily winked at you in response and you wished you weren't tied down so that you could give her a taste of her own medicine. Arianne wasn't finished speaking however and continued lavishing your tormentors with praise.

"If you girls continue showing that kind of dedication and sadism, I might just promote the three of you to being interrogators for me" Arianne told them, making the girls blush with excitement. Arianne didn't have all praise to give her maids and actually had some criticism for the three.

"But..." She continued, making the girls tense up in what you could best describe as a combination of fear, nervousness and anticipation. "You could've done much better. Slow your pace down slightly to avoid tiring your prey out too"

Arianne pointed to you, still panting and sweating from your torment. "While initially you three were a bit slow at finding the magic tickle spot, your pace was still an acceptable one as you eased him into the tickling. Once you found his ticklish little belly however, you threw all pacing and teasing out the window and merely focused on making him scream as loud as you could, resulting in him tiring out after only five minutes"

That tiny revelation made you want to pass out from shock then and there. That tummy tickling torture had only lasted FIVE MINUTES. It seemed to last for 5 hours and only five minutes had elapsed.

Arianne continued addressing the three girls and said "However, since you three proved to be capable ticklers and succeeded in satisfying my sadistic lust for his crazed laughter, I will keep my promise that neither you will take his place as my pet"

The Blonde, The Brunette, and The Redhead all breathed a sigh of relief, but failed to notice a small sinister smirk form on Arianne's face. You noticed the smirk right away and instantly knew that the princess had a twist up her sleeve. Your only hope was that it'd be at their expense for once instead of yours.

Indeed, your prayers were answered when Arianne added "At least not on a permanent daily basis"

"What do you mean, your highness?" Asked the Brunette, clearly confused by what Arianne meant by that.

"I promised that if you three did a sufficient job, none of you would have to take his place as my tickle toy" Arianne explained. "However, even my little tickle slave needs a break every now and then and so for that reason, every other day, one of you shall switch places with him for an hour so that he can vent some frustration"

You were just as puzzled as the girls were at that statement, something that didn't go unnoticed by your primary tormentor who said "Don't look so shocked, tickle toy. You deserve a little treat for being such a good tickle toy"

"S-So which one of us is going to be his ticklee?" The Redhead asked nervously.

With an absolutely evil smile, Arianne pointed at you and said "It's up to him. He'll decide which one of you he'll get a little payback on"

Wearing an evil smile of your own as you were unchained from the rack, you chose...

"EEEEEEEEEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHE OHOHOHOHO STAHAHAHAHAP HAHAHAHAHEHEHEHE STAHAHAHAHAP IHIHIHI'M SOHOHORREEEEEY" The Blonde screamed as she squirmed around to and fro on the rack, having as much success as you did at escaping the tormenting tickling.

"Yeah, but not as sorry as you're going to be" You answer back, furiously wriggling your fingers in the center of her underarms, making her shake her head left and right. She was going to be in for a long two hours. You would make sure of that.

"P-P-PLEEEEEEEEEEEAHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHESE STAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAP HEHEHEHEHEHEHEHE NOHOHOHOHOHO MOHOHOHOHOHORE HUHUHUHUHUHUH" She pleaded as your wriggling fingers explored every square inch of her armpits.

HEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEEEE NOHOHOHOHOHO HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA L-L-LEAVE MY TOHOHOHOES AHAHAHALOHOHONE EHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHE" She screams, starting to wriggle her toes in an attempt to get them away from your invasive fingers. I can see why you liked down this so much" You say, half teasingly as you lick both of her feet, sliding her tongue in between her long narrow toes, along the sides of her feet and along her arches. "EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEHEHEHEHEHEH EHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEH EHEHEHEHEHEHEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE" The Blonde shrieked, going absolutely berserk, frantically flailing around and trying to cover up her defenseless soles.

Even after all this time living here, you still hate Dragonstone with a passion. The storms frighten you and keep you awake at night Even in the middle of summer, the cold still bites, with slightly chilly weather being the best that you can hope for. You also can't stand nearly anyone else on this island. The soldiers and sailors are crass, loud and disgusting. They terrify you with their drunken leerings and vulgar remarks. You also don't get along with nearly any of the female servants, ignoring you on a good day and being spiteful and mean to you for no reason on a bad one. The only thing that keeps you from stowing away on the first ship back to the mainland of Westeros and civilization is your loyalty to your lady, Selyse Baratheon, and to the two other handmaidens who serve her alongside you.

Life on Dragonstone was hugely changed however, when the Red Priestess from Asshai arrived. The Lady Melisandre, the Red Woman, had seemingly come out of nowhere, but soon the whole island seemed to bend to her whim. You had watched from the castle as she started to burn the effigies of the New Gods on the beaches, and had watched as more and more people joined her in front of the flames. This hurt you to no end. You were a devoted follower of the Seven, and briefly considered being a septa before being convinced by your family that your life would benefit more greatly from being the handmaiden to the lady of a Great House. The burning of the Gods and Holy Scriptures, and the sermons the Red Woman spoke in front of the flames ran contrary to all you believed in and all that you were.

You could also feel a strange aura exuding from Melisandre. Not just the general mystery about her that everyone felt, but towards you specifically. When walking past her through the halls, she would stop and watch you go by. When in crowded rooms, she seemed to only look at you, staring right through you with her piercing eyes.
One night, as you and the other handmaidens readied Lady Selyse for bed, she asked the three of you if you were loyal to Lady Melisandre and the Lord of Light. Selyse had been one of the first to join the side of Melisandre, not long after her husband, Stannis, had. The other two handmaidens quickly and fearfully offered their services and lives to both Melisandre and the Lord of Light. You however, despite your better sense of judgement, had chosen to stay true to yourself and your beliefs, saying to Selyse that you will always be loyal to her and to Stannis, but that you can't say the same of Melisandre and the Lord of Light. Selyse had remained silent, nodded politely, and dismissed all three of you.

After this, you and the other handmaidens retired to your rooms. It had only been a few hour when a guard woke you, in the dead of night, saying that Lady Selyse was urgently requesting your assistance and to come at once.
